value.verse:
O LORD, I call to you;
my Rock, do not be deaf to my cry; *
Hear the voice of my prayer when I cry out to you, *
value.halfverse: when I lift up my hands to your holy of holies.

who speak peaceably with their neighbors,
 while strife is in their hearts.
value.verse: Do not snatch me away with the wicked or with the evildoers, *

value.halfverse: and according to the wickedness of their actions.
value.verse: Repay them according to their deeds, *

value.halfverse: and give them their just deserts.
value.verse: According to the work of their hands repay them, *

value.halfverse: therefore he will break them down and not build them up.

value.halfverse: for he has heard the voice of my prayer.
my heart trusts in him, and I have been helped;
value.verse: The LORD is my strength and my shield; *

value.halfverse: and in my song will I praise him.
value.verse: Therefore my heart dances for joy, *

value.halfverse: a safe refuge for his anointed.
value.verse: The LORD is the strength of his people, *
Save your people and bless your inheritance; *
value.halfverse: shepherd them and carry them for ever.
